result.eng: The water is heated with sunshine.
result.ga: Déantar an t-uisce a théamh le solas na gréine
result.orig: Déantar an t-uisce a théamh le solas na gréine
result.html: Déantar an t-uisce a théamh le solas na gréineThe water is heated with sunshine.
result.ponchtml: Déantar an t-uisce a ṫéaṁ le solas na gréineThe water is heated with sunshine.

result.ga: Las an solas le do thoil
result.orig: Las an solas le do thoil
result.html: Las an solas le do thoilTurn the light on, please.
result.ponchtml: Las an solas le do ṫoilTurn the light on, please.

result.eng: The lights are on but there is nobody home.
result.ga: Tá na soilse lasta ach níl aon dhuine sa bhaile
result.orig: Tá na soilse lasta ach níl aon dhuine sa bhaile
result.html: Tá na soilse lasta ach níl aon dhuine sa bhaileThe lights are on but there is nobody home.
result.ponchtml: Tá na soilse lasta aċ níl aon ḋuine sa ḃaileThe lights are on but there is nobody home.

result.html: Tá an solas sin bristeThat light is broken.
result.ponchtml: Tá an solas sin bristeThat light is broken.

result.eng: She flipped the trip switch. The lights came on again.
result.ga: Chas sí an lasc thuisleach Las na soilse an athuair
result.orig: Chas sí an lasc thuisleach Las na soilse an athuair
result.html: Chas sí an lasc thuisleach Las na soilse an athuairShe flipped the trip switch. The lights came on again.
result.ponchtml: Ċas sí an lasc ṫuisleaċ Las na soilse an aṫuairShe flipped the trip switch. The lights came on again.

result.ga: Bhí sé ag gabháil ó sholas
result.orig: Bhí sé ag gabháil ó sholas
result.html: Bhí sé ag gabháil ó sholasIt was getting dark.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag gaḃáil ó ẛolasIt was getting dark.

result.eng: Bright shining lights that would blinden you.
result.ga: Solais loinnireacha gheala a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.orig: Solais loinnireacha gheala a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.html: Solais loinnireacha gheala a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agatBright shining lights that would blinden you.
result.ponchtml: Solais loinnireaċa ġeala a ḃainfeaḋ an t-aṁarc as an tsúil agatBright shining lights that would blinden you.

result.eng: The streets we emptying and the lights were going out.
result.ga: Bhí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gabháil as
result.orig: Bhí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gabháil as
result.html: Bhí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gabháil asThe streets we emptying and the lights were going out.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gaḃáil asThe streets we emptying and the lights were going out.

result.eng: A little while after it got dark...
result.ga: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.orig: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.html: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dóA little while after it got dark...
result.ponchtml: Tamall beag i ndiaiḋ a ġaḃáil ó ẛolas dóA little while after it got dark...

result.ga: Bhí sé ag gabháil ó sholas de
result.orig: Bhí sé ag gabháil ó sholas de
result.html: Bhí sé ag gabháil ó sholas deIt was getting dark.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag gaḃáil ó ẛolas deIt was getting dark.

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ga: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.html: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ponchtml: Níl feiḋm orm aon lá oibre a ḋéanaṁ le mo ẛolas Tá mé i mo ẛáiṫ den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
